also for everyone having issues, i used the first part of the generated serial (STX!LZ) as the username (u click on the keygen and generate one for the product of dvd creator) and everything after that part was the serial... if you need anymore help well... i dunno what to tell you....

Suggestion: Wrap your keygens/cracks in an archive format (RAR or 7Zip or...) so Norton File Insight won't detect and remove them half-way through download, urging newbies like me to abort. Thanks anyway.

This is very difficult to understand. But after a bit of mucking around i got it. first of all install xilisoft dvd creator, once you have done that close dvd creator and open the keygen. Once the keygen opens select Dvd Creator from the drop list then click 'make key.' Leave the keygen open and open dvd creator. Click help then click entre license code. for your username put:   STX!LZ and for your licsence code put:     STX!LZ64747125420EMU9858-59FD-BC73-B87A
Thanks Adamattard! Works perfectly. Awesome program. Will update if it stops working
